sentences.en: 18-hour cities combine the best of 24-hour and 9-5 cities, which contributes to downtown revitalization.
sentences.cn: 18小时城市结合了24小时城市和早九晚五城市的优点，有助于振兴市中心。

sentences.en: We will continue to promote restructuring and revitalization in key industries.
sentences.cn: 继续推进重点产业调整振兴。

sentences.en: I invite you to join me on this journey of reaffirmation, remembrance, reform, and revitalization!
sentences.cn: 请你们和我一起来重申、回顾、革新和重振旗鼓！
